column3: @sipa ie sizelimit < overhead of zero transactions ?\n

@pstratem Yes, given that there are various support data structures in the mempool whose size is hard to scale linearly with the number of transactions, this seems like a reasonable solution. There are certainly others (like requiring the trim size to be at least a multiple of a transaction + overhead), but this is so simple and probably something that should have been there as a safeguard from th
